snippet: The journalist, Akhmednabi Akhmednabiyev, had accused local authorities of persecuting and kidnapping Muslims and was shot to death while driving his car.
abstract: Akhmednabi Akhmednabiyev, journalist who accused local officials of persecuting and kidnapping Muslims, is shot dead in ambush in Russian republic of Dagestan; Akhmednabiyev had survived assassination attempt at same location in January.
lead_paragraph: The journalist, Akhmednabi Akhmednabiyev, had accused local authorities of persecuting and kidnapping Muslims and was shot to death while driving his car.

headline.main: Journalist Assassinated in Violent Russian Republic
